original_text: After the Arameans saw that they had been routed by Israel, they sent messengers and had Arameans brought from beyond the Euphrates River, with Shophak the commander of Hadadezer’s army leading them.
korean_text: 아람 사람이 자기가 이스라엘 앞에서 패하였음을 보고 사신을 보내 강 건너편에 있는 아람 사람을 불러내니 하닷에셀의 군대사령관 소박이 그들을 거느린지라

sentences.original_text: that they had been routed by Israel
and had Arameans brought from beyond the Euphrates River
sentences.korean_translation: 유브라데 강 저편에서 아람 사람들을 데려오게 했다

sentences.original_text: with Shophak the commander of Hadadezer's army
